assetsReceived._description: Update our store of assets data

loadAssets._description: Refresh our list of assets for a given account

loadPayments._description: Refresh our list of payments for a given account

paymentsReceived._description: Update our store of payments data

accountsReceived._description: Update our store of account data

selectAccount._description: Select an account. Optionally navigate to the account page.

linkExistingAccount._description: Link an existing Stellar account with this Keybase user.
linkExistingAccount.name: string

validateAccountName._description: Ask the service to validate an account name.
validateAccountName.name: string

validateSecretKey._description: Ask the service to validate an account secret key.

clearErrors._description: Clear errors from the store at times like opening or closing a form dialog.
